text: Service was abit slow as the queue was super long and pakcik was the only person manning the front counter (makcik was cooking in the kitchen). Place was not made for dine-in so deco was basic. However, food was super delicious, really authentic Malay food. SEDAPPP!!!
I'm from Malaysia. My Fiance(Singaporean) requested me to try Nasi Rawan. Sedap giler. You must try Begedil and Lontong you will never regret‚ù§Ô∏è

Abang is very2 generous with the portion of the food and the price really affordable for everyone. The kuah rawan is superb awesome and power. The best nasi rawan ever in Singapore!  If you are local, i can say better then Hajah Maimunah Restaurant or Rumah Makan Minang. Trust me & mark my wordüëçüèæ

I should say, they did it very well in terms of cooking, the traditional taste, the smell of it, the price of it. And also a honest business. Their very friendly too!!
